column2: So God created man in his own image
column3: So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.

column2: Therefore shall ye keep my commandments
column3: Therefore shall ye keep my commandments, and do them: I am the LORD.

column2: And thou shalt love the LORD thy God
column3: And thou shalt love the LORD thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy might.
Give thanks unto the LORD, call upon his name, make known his deeds among the people.
Hearken unto this, O Job: stand still, and consider the wondrous works of God.

column2: Let the words of my mouth
column3: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O LORD, my strength, and my redeemer.
Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.

column2: The LORD is good to all
column3: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
Hear instruction, and be wise, and refuse it not.
Even a child is known by his doings, whether his work be pure, and whether it be right.

column2: He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good
column3: He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the LORD require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God?

column2: But I say unto you, Love your enemies
column3: But I say unto you, Love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them which despitefully use you, and persecute you.
And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.
Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.

column2: And as ye would that men
column3: And as ye would that men should do to you, do ye also to them likewise.
And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.
Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.

But ye shall receive power, after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you: and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem, and in all Judea, and in Samaria, and unto the uttermost part of the earth.

column2: So then every one of us
column3: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God.
Whether therefore ye eat, or drink, or whatsoever ye do, do all to the glory of God.
Let all things be done decently and in order.
Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.
I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

column2: Wherefore, my beloved brethren, let every man be
column3: Wherefore, my beloved brethren, let every man be swift to hear, slow to speak, slow to wrath.
We love him, because he first loved us.
